author: bentmann
msg: o Updated template for index page of Plugin Documentation Standard (http://www.nabble.com/Index-Page-of-Plugin-Documentation-Standard-to19104334.html)

author: bentmann
msg: o Added integration test to check multiple Maven invocations per project

author: ate
msg: Fixing an unexpected error when using the ${applicationRoot} variable by Spring if it contains (Windows) \ path delimiters.
Somehow Spring seems to "mangle" such variables. Simply replacing \ by / prevents this.

author: tabish
msg: Changed the way messages are handled in transacted sessions, now they are all ack'd even if the commit is done in the onMessage callback.  Also improved transaction support to not ack ever message until the comit is done so that one large ack can be done in openwire reducing network overhead.
